shes pa'i skad dang dbyangs kyi tshul mkhas pa la 'jug cing khong du chud par byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skad kyi tshul thams cad la mkhas pa
zhes bya ba ste/ ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kha dog dang bral bar rab tu shes te/ tha

mi dad pa'i mdog rnam pa myed pa'i kha dog dang / bye brag med pa'i kha dog dang / rnam par dbye ba myed pa'i kha dog dang / sngon po myed pa'i kha dog dang / ser po myed pa'i kha dog dang / dkar po myed pa'i kha
dog dang / nag po myed pa'i kha dog dang / dmar po myed pa'i yang rab tu shes te/ de de bas kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i tshe/ rang gi lus kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan par byin gyis brlob te/

mtha' yas pa'i kha dog dang tshad myed pa'i kha dog dang rnam par dag pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu brgyan pa'i kha dog dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / dpe myed pa'i kha dog dang / kun tu snang

ba'i kha dog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i kha dog dang / myi bsdug pa myed pa'i kha dog dang / zad myi shes pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu bsal ba'i kha dog dang / kha na ma tho ba myed pa'i kha dog dang mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i kha dog

dang thub par dka' ba'i kha dog dang / nyams par mi 'gyur ba'i kha dog dang / yongs su shin tu bsgrub pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i kha dog dang / dpag tu myed pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu bsrungs pa'i

kha dog dang / shin tu bsags pa'i kha dog dang / yongs su smin par byed pa'i kha dog dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du bsgrub pa'i kha dog dang / thogs pa myed pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu dang ba'i kha dog dang / rnyog pa

myed pa'i kha dog dang / rab tu bsal ba'i kha dog dang / mdangs dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / zil gyis gnon pa'i kha dog dang / thams cad zil gyis gnon

pa'i kha dog dang / thams cad zil du brlag pa'i kha dog dang / thams cad zil du brlog par byed pa'i kha dog dang / rab rib myed pa'i kha dog dang / mun pa myed pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu mnyam par bzhag

pa'i kha dog dang / sems bde ba'i kha dog dang / mtshan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / che ba nyid dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / spyod yul dang ldan pa'i

kha dog dang / yang dag par bsgrub pa'i kha dog dang / bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu sbyangs pa'i kha dog dang / mchog tu byung zhing rgya che ba'i kha dog dang / thub pa myed pa'i kha dog dang /

gnas pa myed pa'i kha dog dang / kun tu mtha' yas pa'i kha dog dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed par rab tu brdal ba'i kha dog dang / rnam par 'phel ba'i kha dog dang / snying po bzung ba'i kha
dog dang / yon tan mchog dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / yid bzhin gyi kha dog dang / mos pa rnam par spyod pa'i kha dog dang / tshogs shin tu bstsags pa'i kha dog dang / chos sgrib pa myed par shin

tu rtogs pa'i kha dog dang / nam mkha' ltar 'od dang ba'i kha dog dang / rnam par dag bas brgyan pa'i kha dog dang / dri ma myed pa'i kha dog dang / rdul dang bral ba'i kha dog dang / rdul myed pa'i kha dog dang /

dri ma myed pa'i kha dog dang / mtshungs pa myed pa'i kha dog dang / blta na bzang po'i kha dog dang / gnas la blta ba'i kha dog dang / dus bzhin du yang dag par ston pa'i kha dog dang / rab tu zhi ba'i kha dog
dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i kha dog dang / 'od shin tu bsags pa'i kha dog dang / bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur pa'i kha dog dang / bde bar byed pa'i kha dog dang / 'jigs pa myed pa'i gti mug myed

par spyod pa'i kha dog dang / ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa'i kha dog dang / chags pa myed pa'i lus kyi kha dog dang / lus kyi rgyan kun tu mtha' yas pa'i kha dog dang / don yod pa'i kha dog dang / byams
pa chen pos yang dag par 'phags pa'i kha dog dang / snying rje chen pos byin gyi brlabs pa'i kha dog dang / tshul mthun pa la 'byung ba'i kha dog dang / bsod nams kyi stobs dang ldan pa'i kha dog
dang / rjes su dran par bya ba'i kha dog dang / rin po che mtha' yas pa'i kha dog dang / rin po che dam pa rnam par snang ba'i kha dog dang / 'gro ba thams cad dad par byed pa'i kha dog dang / thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du gyur pa'i kha dog dang / bzhin 'dzum pa'i kha dog dang / rin po che'i rgyan gyi dam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i kha dog dang / sems mi gnas pa'i kha dog dang / gnas
myed pa'i kha dog dang / byin gyi brlabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i kha dog dang / rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du mas khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i kha dog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su yang dag par

byung ba'i kha dog dang / 'dra ba myed pa'i kha dog dang / chos kyi dbyings su brdal ba'i kha dog dang / 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i kha dog dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi kha dog dang / shin tu grub pa'i kha dog dang / shin tu sbyang pas rab tu byung

ba'i kha dog dang / 'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du spyod lam ston pa'i kha dog dang / blta na mi ngoms pa'i kha dog dang / rnam pa sna tshogs su 'od gsal ba'i kha dog dang / 'od gzer gyi dra ba grangs myed pa
rab tu 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang / 'od sna tshogs brjod du myed pa'i kha dog dang / dri zhim po dang 'od bsam gyi mi khyab pas khams gsum las yang dag par 'da' ba'i kha dog dang / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor

lta bu'i 'od gzer gyis tshad myed par snang ba'i kha dog dang / 'khor lo dpe myed pa'i gzugs byin gyis brlob pa'i kha dog dang / me tog gi sprin yid du 'ong ba mtha' yas par rab tu 'thor ba'i kha dog dang /
phreng ba'i sprin gyi pad mo sna tshogs su bsgrub pas yang dag par brgyan pa'i kha dog dang / 'gro ba thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i kha dog dang / spos zhim po thams cad kyi bcud 'byung bas spos
'phro bar 'gyed pa'i kha dog dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzod spu nas byung ba'i kha dog dang / sgra dbyangs brjod du myed pas chos thams cad bstan pa yang dag par ston pa'i kha
dog dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pas kun tu bzang po'i kha dog tu bdag gi lus byin gyis rlobs ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni

kha dog myed pa'i chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas mthong bas 'dul ba dang / rjes su dran pas 'dul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor los 'dul ba dang / dus kyis 'dul ba dang / snyeng bkur bas 'dul ba dang / khong
du chud par bya bas 'dul ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi 'dul ba dang / rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba dang / cho 'phrul bsam gyi mi khyab pas 'dul ba rnams de lta bu'i kha dog tu rang gi lus
byin gyis rlob po/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi kha dog grangs myed pa'i lus mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyan ces bya ba mngon par shes pa'i
ye shes 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'grel ba la brtsom ste/ brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad bdag myed par
rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'ong ba myed par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'bral ba myed par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad bye brag myed par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad
tha dad pa myed par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad gnyis su byar myed par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad myi gnyis pa dang myi gnyis pa ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad
bdag nyid myed par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'dra ba myed par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'gro ba myed par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad ma skyes par rab tu shes so/ /
chos thams cad ma 'gag par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'pho ba myed par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'jig pa myed par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad bden pa myed par rab
tu shes so/ /chos thams cad brdzun pa myed par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad mtshan nyid myed pas mtshan nyid gcig par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad yod pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /
chos thams cad myed pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad chos kyang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad chos ma yin pa 'ang rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad spyod
pa la gzhol ba yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad spyod pa la mi gzhol ba 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad las kyang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams
cad las ma yin pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad rnam par smin pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad rnam par smin pa ma yin pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes
so/ /chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba myed par yang rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad bde ba 'ang ma yin par rab
tu shes so/ /chos thams cad brda ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad don dam pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad don dam pa ma yin pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes
so/ /chos thams cad 'byung ba 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad mi 'byung ba 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'byin pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos
thams cad myi 'byin pa 'ang rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad tshad myed par yang rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad tshad myed pa ma yin par yang rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'jig rten pa
'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad rgyu las byung ba 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams

cad rgyu las ma byung ba 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad kha dog nges pa myed pa 'ang rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad kha dog nges pa myed pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams
cad kha dog yongs su grub pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad kha dog yongs su ma grub pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad 'byung ba 'ang ma yin par rab
tu shes so/ /chos thams cad byung ba 'ang ma yin ma byung bar ma yin par yang rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad rnam par brtags pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad
rnam par brtags pa ma yin pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad tshul yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad tshul ma yin pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /

de ni spyod pa la mngon par chags pa myed do/ /don dam pa la gnas pa myed do/ /chos la rab tu rtog pa myed do/ /yi ge yongs su bsgrub pa myed do/ /zhi ba'i rjes su shin tu 'brang ngo / /smon lam yongs su myi
gtong ngo / /don gyi tshul la rnam par blta'o/ /chos kyi tshul la rab tu 'jug go/ /chos kyi sprin kun nas slong ngo / /chos su 'bab pa'i yi ge'i char mngon par 'bebaso/ /chos brjod du myed pa la
'jug go/ /tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa zad mi shes pa don gyi tshul rab tu brjod cing chos kyi tshul mngon par ston pas chos thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig la mkhas pa dang / chos thams

cad spobs pas thabs mkhas pa'i tshul brjod du myed pa'i yang rjod du myed pa la rab tu 'jug go/ /byams pa chen po rnam par dag pa dang ldan zhing snying rje chen po rab tu thob pa/ yi ge myed pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ yi

ge mngon par bsgrub pa'i don la brtson zhing 'gal ba myed pa/ rang gzhan gyi chos la brtson pa chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar ston pas gos pa myed pa/ brjod pa thams cad kyi rjes su song

ba'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ de chos thams cad zad mi shes pa'i spobs pas ston to/ /brjod do/ /rnam par 'god do/ /yang dag par ston to/ /'grel to rnam par 'gyed do/ /'byin to/ /khong du chud par byed do/ /

rab tu nan tan te/ /rtogs par byed do/ /rab tu bsgrub po rnam par spyod do/ /the rtsom sel to dogs pa gcod do/ /de kho na ston to rang bzhin brjod do/ /'gro ba la phan 'dogs so/ /chos nyid las mi nyams so/ /
mi gnyis pa la 'jug go chags pa myed pa'i sgo ston to/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pas rab tu 'jom pa'i sgras sgra'i char yang bsam pa ji lta bu'i dus las yol bar
myi byed par mngon par 'bebs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad shes pa'i ye shes kyi mngon par shes pa ste/ dgu pa'o/ /
kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems skad cig re re zhing chos thams cad 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug kyang / byang chub sems

dpa'i lam gyi rgyud myi gcod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i las kyang thogs par myi byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa chen po las kyang rnam par mi 'da'o/ /snying rje chen po las kyang phyir myi ldog

go/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang rgyun myi gcod do/ /zhing thams cad rab tu 'gyed cing mkhas pas kyang skyo bar myi byed do/ /'gro ba thams cad yongasu dgrol ba'i smon lam yang rgyun myi gcod do/ /
chos kyi 'khor lo yang thogs par myi byed do/ /sems can yongs su smyin par bya ba dang / gdul bar bya ba yang ring du myi spong ngo / /sangs rgyas mchod cing rim gro bya ba yang rgyun myi gcod do/ /
chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur ba'i sgo las kyang phyir myi ldog go/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba'i bskal ba myed par yang myi 'gyur ro/ /chos thams cad yongasu dri ba las kyang phyir myi ldog go/ mnyam
pa nyid dang stong pa yang rab tu sheso/ /sgrib pa myed par yang mngon par bsgrub po/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la khyad par gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /zhing
thams cad kyi gzhi dang / dbyibs tha dad pa'i rjes su 'ang rab tu 'jug ste/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang 'thob pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang de dag tu
chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur bslab pa'ang shin tu bslabs pa yin/ chos thams cad mtshan ma myed pa la zhugs pas chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang
ldan pa yin/ chos thams cad lus myed pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul dang spyod pa'i tshul khong du chud pa dang ldan pa yin/ chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba
la myi gnas pa yin/ chos kyi tshul thams cad rab tu rtogs shing bsam pa dang / dbang po ji lta ba'ang rab tu rtogs pa yin/ de 'dod na bskal pa dang bskal pa gcig dang / bskal

pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa khrag khrig dang / bskal pa khri khrag brgya dang / bskal pa khrag khrig stong dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang /
bskal pa tshad myed pa dang / dpag tu myed pa dang / grangs myed pa dang / bsam gyi myi khyab pa dang mtshungs pa myed pa dang / gzhal du myed pa dang / kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / mu myed pa dang sa
mtshams myed pa dang / bskal pa brjod du myed pa'i yang brjod du myed par chos thams cad 'gag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par 'jug kyang de'i lus dub par myi 'gyur ro/ /nyams
chung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa zhan par mi 'gyur ro/ /chud myi za/ rnam par chud myi za'o/ /zhum par myi 'gyur ro/ /rnam par zhum par myi 'gyur ro/ /zad par mi 'gyur ro/ /dngos po yod
pa dang myed par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyang brjod do/ /sems can gyi dus kyang yongs su myi spong ngo / /
sems can 'dul ba'i dus la bab pa yang thogs par myi byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid kyang rnam par 'phel bar byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'i mnyam pa nyid kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /
sems can thams cad kyi don kyang yongs su myi gtong ngo / /sprul pa'i rgyud kyang rgyun myi gcod do/ /myig yor lta bu'i chos kyi tshul las kyang ldog par myi byed do/ /bsam gtan dang / ting
nge 'dzin las kyang myi g.yo'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad 'gag pa zhes bya ba ste/ ye shes kyi mngon par shes
pa bcu'o/ /de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pas bsam gyi mi khyab pa yin/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi
khyab pa yin/ nyan thos thams cad kyi bsam gyis myi khyab pa yin/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsam gyis myi khyab pa yin/ sa 'og ma la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
thams cad kyi bsam gyis myi khyab pa yin lus kyi las bsam gyis myi khyab pa yin/ ngag gi las bsam gyis myi khyab pa yin/ yid kyi las bsam gyis myi khyab pa yin ting nge 'dzin
rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug pa bsam gyis myi khyab pa yin/ ye shes kyi spyod yul bsam gyis myi khyab pa yin te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'
de dag bstan par mdzad cing bshad pa dang / gnas pa de dag dgod par mdzad de/ khong du chud par mdzad pa dang / mngon par shes pa de lta bu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bstan pa dang / brjod pa
dang / ston pa dang / bkrol tu bstan pa dang / yongasu brjod pa ni ma gtogs so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa ste/ de dag la
gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni dus gsum thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa sgrib pa myed pa rab tu 'thob po/ /mngon par shes pa'i le'u ste
sum bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po nyi shu brgyad pa/ de nas byang chub sems
dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po gang 'di rnams ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bzod pa thob pa ste/

bzod pa thob pa de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bzod pa thams cad kyis sgrib pa myed pa thob pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zad myi shes pa sgrib pa myed pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba dag go/ /

bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste sgra khong du chud pa'i bzod pa dang / 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang / mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i bzod pa dang / smyig rgyu lta bu'i bzod pa dang / rmi lam lta bu'i
bzod pa dang / sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa dang / sprul pa lta bu'i bzod pa dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i bzod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag bcu po de rnams
byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa thob pa ste/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsungs so/ /gsung ngo / /gsung bar 'gyur ro/ /
kye rgyal ba'i sras dag de la bzod pa dang po sgra khong du chud pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste chos de dag thos nas myi 'jigs mi skrag /skrag par myi 'gyur zhing dad pa dang / yid ches pa dang / mos
pa dang spro ba dang / 'jug pa dang rjes su 'brang ba dang / de 'di bzhin du gnas shing khong du chud par byed pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
po rnams kyi sgra khong du chud pa'i bzod pa ste dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob pa gnyis pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal
ba'i sras dag /'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di dag ni mthun pa zhes bya bar rtog go/ /dpyod do/ /mnyam par byed do/ /myi 'gal bar byed do/ /chos de dag la ji ltar
'thun par 'jug par bya ba de ltar rnam par sgom mo/ /bsam pa rnam par dag par byed do/ /mnyam par byed do/ /brtson par byed do/ /rtogs par byed do/ /rab tu bsgrub po/ /kye rgyal ba'i
sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mthun pa'i bzod pa thob pa ste gnyis pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
kyi mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa gsum pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdul tsam gyi chos kyang gang yang skyes par mthong ba myed do/ /

chos gang yang 'gag par mthong ba myed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang ma skyes pa de ni ma 'gags pa'o gang ma 'gags pa de ni mi zad pa'o/ /gang myi zad pa de ni rdul myed pa'o/ /gang rdul myed pa de ni

tha mi dad pa'o/ /gang tha myi dad pa de ni gzhi myed pa'o/ /gang gzhi myed pa de ni zhi ba'i sa'o/ /gang zhi ba'i sa yin pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'o/ /gang 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni mngon par
'du bya ba myed pa'o/ /gang mngon par 'du bya ba myed pa ni smon pa myed pa'o/ /gang smon pa myed pa de ni gnas pa myed cing len pa myed pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa ste/ gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
kyi sgyu ma lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa bzhi gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul
gyis sgyu ma lta bur 'jug ste/ chos kyi rnam pa gcig la rnam pa mang por mos par byed do/ /chos rnam pa mang po la chos kyi rnam pa gcig tu mos par byed do/ /de ni chos de dag la
sgyu ma'i tshul gyis zhing du 'ang sgom par byed do/ /sems can du'ang khong du chud par byed do/ /chos thams cad kyi dbyings du yang rtogs par byed do/ /'jig rten gyi khams su yang
mnyam par byed do/ /sangs rgyas skye bar yang mtshungs par byed do/ /'jug tu myed pa'i tshul gyis kyang rjes su 'jug go/ /byin gyi brlabs kyi tshul gyis kyang mngon par bsgrubaso/ /'di lta
ste dper na/ sgyu ma ni glang po'i lus la yang myi gnas so/ /rta'i lus la yang myi gnas so/ /shing rta'i lus la yang mi gnas so/ /rkang tang gi lus la yang mi gnas so/ /skyes pa
la 'ang myi gnas so/ /rogs po la 'ang myi gnas so/ /bu mo la 'ang mi gnas so/ /shing la 'ang myi gnas so/ /lo ma la 'ang myi gnas so/ /me tog la 'ang myi gnas so/ /'bras bu la 'ang
myi gnas so/ /sa dang chu dang mye dang rlung la 'ang myi gnas so/ /nyin zhag dang zla ba yar kham mar kham dang / zla ba dang lo la 'ang myi gnas so/ /lo brgya la 'ang myi gnas so/ /zla ba dang nyi
ma la 'ang myi gnas so/ /bskal pa la 'ang myi gnas so/ /zhi ba dang rab tu zhi ba la 'ang myi gnas so/ /sna tshogs dang rnam pa sna tshogs la 'ang myi gnas so/ /gcig pa dang tha dad pa la 'ang mi

gnas so/ /yangs pa dang dog pa la 'ang mi gnas so/ /rgya chen po dang rgya chung ngu la 'ang mi gnas so/ /tshad yod pa dang tshad myed pa la 'ang myi gnas so/ /phra ba dang rags pa la 'ang myi gnas so/ /'khor
sna tshogs la 'ang myi gnas so/ /'khor kyang sgyu ma la mi gnas/ sgyu ma yang 'khor la mi gnas te/ sgyu ma kun tu bstan pa dang sna tshogs kyi sgyu ma rnam pa tha dad pa bstan pa'i grangs su
bgrang ba yang yod do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten thams cad la/ sgyu ma lta bur 'jug cing las kyi 'jig rten dang / nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten
dang / zhing gi 'jig rten dang chos kyi 'jig rten dang / dus kyis 'jig rten dang / rgyud kyi 'jig rten dang / ldan pa'i 'jig rten dang / myi ldan pa'i 'jig rten dang / 'jug pa'i 'jig rten dang /
mngon par 'du bya ba'i 'jig rten la 'jug pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyis thams cad la sgyu ma'i rnam par 'jug pas sems can rnams
skye bar myi byed do/ /'jig par myi byed do/ /zhing rnams skye bar mi byed do/ /'jig par mi byed do/ /chos rnams skye bar myi byed do/ /'jig par mi byed do/ /'das pa la mi rtog go/ /'das pa la rnam
par myi rtog go/ /ma 'ongs pa la mngon par 'du myi byed do/ /ma 'ongs pa 'byung bar myi byed do/ /da ltar byung ba la gnas pa myed do/ /da ltar byung ba la chags pa myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
la dpyod pa myed do/ /byang chub la yongs su rtog pa myed do/ /sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi byed do/ /sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi byed do/ /smon lam la gnas par mi
byed do/ /skyon med pa la chags par mi byed do/ /mnyam pa nyid mi len to/ /chags pa myed pa mi 'dor ro/ /zhing la chags pa myed do/ /tha dad pa med par yang khong du chud do/ /sems can
gyi khams kyang mngon par bsgrub ste/ sems can gyi khams tha dad pa'ang rab tu shes so/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang khong du chud de gnas pa'i chos nyid las kyang myi g.yo'o/ /dus mnyam pa nyid
la'ang rab tu 'jug ste/ dus la rnam par rtog pas kyang 'gal bar mi byed do/ /phung po dang skye mched rnams kyang mngon par bsgrub ste/ gnas yang dag par gzhan pa
'ang khong du chud par byed do/ /sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed de/ chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid tha dad pa myed par yang rab tu shes so/ /chos thams cad brjod du myed cing yi ge
myed par yang rab tu shes te/ so so yang dag par rig pas kyang thogs pa myed do/ /sems can thams cad dgrol ba'i don du 'dod pa la 'ang chags par myi byed do/ /snying rje chen pos
kyang 'dul ba'i sems can rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/ /sems can la lta ba'i phyir snying rje chen po 'ang byin gyis brlob ste/ snying rje chen po'i phyogs la 'ang sems can
thams cad yongs su 'grel to/ /sngon gyi rgyu yang rab tu brjod de rgyu 'pho ba myed pa 'am yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /'di ni byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgyu ma lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste bzhi pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi smyig rgyu ba lta bur rab tu shes te/ bzod
pa thob pa lnga pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad smyig rgyu lta bur rab tu shes te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ smyig rgyu ni yul
na 'ang myi gnas phyogs na 'ang myi gnas pa'o/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang yul na yang myi gnas/ phyogs na 'ang mi gnas pa'i chos nyid rab tu shes te/ 'jig
rten na 'ang myi gnas/ phyi rol na 'ang mi gnas pa dang / yod pa 'ang ma yin/ myed pa 'ang ma yin pa dang / rtag pa 'ang ma yin/ chad pa 'ang ma yin par rnam par rig par gyur pa rab tu shes so/ /yang

dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nang zhes bya ba nang na gnas pa ma yin pa dang / nang zhes bya ba phyi rol na gnas pa ma yin pa dang / kha dog gcig pa ma yin pa dang / kha dog tha dad pa ma yin pa
'ang rab tu shes te/ chos thams cad kha dog myed pa'i sa thob par bya ba 'ang rab tu rdzogs par byed do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mig
rgyu lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste/ lnga pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmi lam lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa drug pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras
dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu shes ste/ 'di lta ste dper na rmi lam ni 'jig rten las byung ba 'ang ma yin/ 'jig rten
las 'das pa 'ang ma yin/ rmi lam ni kun nas nyon mongs 'dod pa'i khams kyang ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyang ma yin/ gzugs myed pa'i khams kyang ma yino/ /rmi lam

ni shi 'pho ba 'ang ma yin/ skye ba 'ang ma yin no/ /rmi lam ni kun nas nyon mongs pa 'ang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba 'ang ma yin no/ /rmi lam ni lta ba 'ang ma yin/ rnam par dag pa 'ang ma yin te/ rmi lam snang ba yang myed pa 'ang ma
yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten thams cad 'khrug pa myed pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul dang / rmi lam la mngon par chags pa dang /
rmi lam rab tu dben pa dang / rmi lam gyi rang bzhin dang / rmi lam gyi byin gyis rlabs pa dang / rmi lam tha mi dad pa dang / rmi lam gyi 'du shes dang rnam par rtog pa dang / rmi lam gyi 'jig rten
khong du chud pa lta bur rab tu shes te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmi lam lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa bdun pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags
pa'i chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos nyid mngon par bsgrub pa'i bslab pa la ched du bslabs pa la mkhas pa yin te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ sgra brnyan ni sgra sna tshogs grag par byed kyang
'pho ba myed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung nang na brjod pa ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
phyi rol na brjod pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /de de ltar shes pa de yang nang nas shes pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /phyi rol nas shes pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes so/ /phyi nang nas
shes pa 'ang ma yin par rab tu shes te/ 'on kyang bstan pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'ang rab tu shes so/ /byin gyis brlabs la mkhas pas 'jug pa yang rab tu shes so/ /tshig kyang rab tu shes
so/ /sgra brnyan lta bur rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i grangs par gyur pa'i chos nyid kyang 'khrug par myi byed de/ sgro 'dogs par yang myi byed la dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa tha dad pa la 'jug
cing bslab pa la 'ang shin tu bslabs pa yin te/ 'di lta ste dper na lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi lha'i bud myed 'grogs ma'i kha'i dbugs kyis lan gcig bus pas kha'i dbugs yan lag stong dang
ldan pa 'byung ngo / /kha'i dbugs la rnam par rtog pa myed kyang dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa stong du sgrog go/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rnam par mi
rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dbyings la 'jug pa'i tshe/ dbyangs kyi yan lag mtha' yas pa rnam par bsgom pa la mkhas pas 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus myed par 'gro ba thams
cad la phyir myi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la rab tu 'jug cing 'khor rnams la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston to/ /lce shin tu yangs pa 'ang byin gyis rlobs ste/ dbyangs chags
pa myed pa 'ang rab tu brjod do/ /zhing thams cad du 'gengs pa'i dbyangs kyang byin gyi brlob bo/ /sems can rnams kyi mtha' yas par khong du chud par yang byin gyi rlobs bo/ /chos rnam
par phye ba 'byam klas pa yang rab tu snang bar byed do/ /dbyangs thams cad la 'jug pa myed do/ /yang rab tu shes so/ /sgra rnam par dmyigs pa 'ang rnam par dmyigs pa myed
par rab tu shes so/ /dbyangs sna tshogs kyang rnam par dgod do/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag gi dkyil 'khor khong du chud pas kyang rab tu spyod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sgra brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste/ bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gzugs brnyan
lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa brgyad pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten nas shi 'pho ba myed do/ /'jig rten du skye ba myed do/ /
'jig rten gyi nang na myi gnas so/ /'jig rten gyi phyi rol na myi gnas so/ /'jig rten du rgyu ba myed do/ /'jig rten du rgyun 'chad pa myed do/ /'jig rten dang 'dres pa myed do/ /'jig rten
dang tha dad pa myed do/ /'jig rten las bros pa myed do/ /'jig rten tu gzhol bar 'gro ba myed do/ /'jig rten las ldog pa myed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' de nyid kyang 'jig rten ma yin te/
'jig rten las 'das pa 'ang ma yin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'ang ma yin te/ smon lam chen po rgyun gcod pa 'ang ma yin no/ /mang ba 'ang ma yin/ nyung ba 'ang ma yin te/
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rdzogs par thob par bya ba la 'ang don yod par spyod do/ /'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /'jig rten gyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang
ba 'ang ma yin no/ /chos kyi rgyud thogs par byed pa 'ang ma yin no/ /'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs brnyan na nyi ma 'am/ zla ba 'am bud med dam skyes pa 'am/ shing ri 'am gnas sam rtsig pa
'am sa 'am/ chu klung gi rgyud dam/ dngos po sna tshogs mtha' yas pa tshad myed pa rnams kyi gzugs gang dang gang yod pa de dag thams cad rnam par dmyigs par byed de/ chu 'am til mar
ram nor bu 'am mching bu 'am/ me long ngam gzhan yang yo byad kha dog gsal ba gang yang rung ste/ de dag shin tu dang ba'i phyir de dag tu gzugs brnyan rnam par dmyigs par byed kyang
gzugs brnyan ni shin tu dang ba'i dbyings de dang 'dres pa 'ang myed de/ gzugs brnyan de de las gud na 'dug pa 'ang ma yin no/ /gzugs brnyan de de ltar rnam par dmyigs pa dang yang 'grog pa
myed do/ /dang ba'i dngos po de yang gzugs brnyan gyi sa dang 'grogs pa myed do/ /gzugs brnyan de chu klung gi rgyun gyis kyang khyer bar mi nus so/ /gzugs brnyan de chu bo'i rgya mtshor 'chi
bar yang mi 'gyur ro/ /dang ba sna tshogs de dag gis kyang gzugs brnyan de la gos par myi 'gyur te/ de dag tu gzugs brnyan rnam par dmyigs pa 'ang yod cing de dag gis bzung ba 'dra yang

gzugs brnyan gang du dmyigs par gyur pa des de'i cha gzung ba myed do/ /gzugs brnyan de ni ring bar yang snang nye bar snang ste de ltar ring ba dang nye ba 'ang myed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po yang rang gi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan gyi rgyud kyi yul du snang bar byed kyang 'di ni gzhan gyi rgyud do/ /'di ni bdag gi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor to/ /zhes gnyis
su mi byed do/ /bdag gi yul dang gzhan gyi yul rnam par dbye ba 'ang rab tu shes so/ /'di lta ste dper na sa bon du gyur pa ni shin tu 'phel zhing skye ba yin te/ chu ba dang lo ma dang / sbu
gu'i gnas su gyur pa nas rnam par dbye ba 'ang yod do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos nyid mi gnyis pa la gnyis kyi mtshan nyid mi 'thun pa'i ye shes la
chags pa myed pa'i mtha'i tshul gyis rab tu 'jug go/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gzugs brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste/
brgyad pa'i bzod pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis myi khyab pa dag tu 'gro ba 'ang myed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du myed pa dag
tu yang snang ngo / /'jig rten gyis khams gang nas kyang g.yo ba myed cing / 'jig rten gyis khams gang du yang 'gro ba myed cing / 'jig rten gyis khams gang du yang 'gro ba myed la lus
kyi dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan du gyur pa yang kun tu rnam par dmigs par byed do/ /rjes su song ba'i lus kyang 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par byed do/ /lus rnam par dbye ba chags
pa myed pas spyod pa yang rab tu shes so/ /gang yang 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi mtshan ma dang / 'jig rten ngang skam yod pa de dag 'dres pa 'ang ma yin/ tha dad pa yang ma yin par rab tu shes
so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rigs dang ldan par byung ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid rnam par dag pa 'ang rab tu 'thob po/ /kha dog mtha' yas pa'i lus thams cad rnam par dag pa
'ang rab tu 'thob po/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sprul pa lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa dgu pa gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad sprul pa lta bur rab tu 'jug ste/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pas sprul pa dang / bsams te sprul pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams
mngon par 'du byed pas sprul pa dang / rnam par rtog pas sprul pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad kyi phyin ci log gis sprul pa dang / sgro btags pas sprul pa dang / 'jig rten
gyi chos thams cad myed pas sprul pa dang / tshig gi lam gyis byin gyis brlabs kyi sprul pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi yongs su rtog pas sprul pa dang / 'du shes kyi sprul pa dang / 'di

lta ste 'dul ba rnam par byang bar bya ba dang / rnam par dag par bya ba'i yongs su rtogs pas sprul pa dang / 'di lta ste dus gsum du phyir myi ldog pas sprul pa mnyam pa nyid kyi byung ba myed pa dang /
'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi sprul pa spyod pas yangs par bya ba dang / 'di lta ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos sprul pa 'gro ba thams cad la bstan par
rnam par bkod pa dang / 'di lta ste chos kyi 'khor lo dang / thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyi sprul pa mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes kyis 'jug pa rab tu shes te de
ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sprul pa rab tu shes par byed do/ /khong du chud par byed do/ /rtogs par byed do/ /yangs

par byed do/ /mtha' dang dbus dang mu myed par ji ltar bskyed pa bzhin du thob par byed do/ /grub par byed do/ /dbang du byed do/ /de kho na nyid du shes so/ /yang dag pa nyid las myi g.yo bar byed do/ /
yang dag par lta'o/ /ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du chud za bar myi byed do/ /'di lta ste dper na/ sprul pa ni sems las myi 'byung ste/ sems kyi chos las ma byung las kyis bsgrubs pa ma yin/ rnam
par smyin pa'i rjes su 'brang ba ma yin/ 'jig rten du skyes pa ma yin/ 'jig rten du 'gag pa ma yin/ chos kyi rjes su snyeg pa ma yin/ chos thob par byed pa ma yin/ ring du gnas
pa ma yin no/ /yid tsam du gnas pa ma yin/ 'jig rten na spyod pa ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa ma yin/ phyogs su 'gro ba ma yin/ phyogs la gzhol ba ma yin/ tshad yod
pa ma yin/ tshad myed pa ma yin/ skyo ba ma yin skyo ba myed pa ma yin/ rgyun chad pa ma yin rgyun mi chad pa ma yin/ 'phags pa ma yin/ so so skye bo ma yin/ kun nas
nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ shi 'pho ba ma yin/ skyes pa ma yin shes pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin 'jig pa ma yin/ 'jig rten la gnas pa ma yin/
chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba ma yin/ mkhas pa ma yin/ shes rab 'chal pa can ma yin/ nye bar len par ma yin/ nye bar mi len pa ma yin/ 'khor ba ma yin/ mya ngan las
'das pa ma yin/ yod pa ma yin/ myed pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'phrul ba'i byin gyis brlabs la mkhas pas/ 'jig
rten na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod de/ de 'jig rten gyi chos la lta zhing bdag mngon par sprul pa byed kyang 'jig rten gyi sprul pa la mngon par chags pa myed do/ /bdag gis
sprul pa la mngon par chags pa myed do/ /bdag dang 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par sprul pa la yongs su rtog pa myed do/ /'jig rten la gnas pa myed do/ /'jig rten rgyun gcod pa
myed do/ /chos la gnas pa myed do/ /chos kyi dbang du 'gro ba ma yin no/ /sems can gyi khams rdul tsam yang 'dul ba myed do/ /sems can gyi khams smon lam las yongs su spong ba
myed do/ /chos de dag la rtog pa myed do/ /rnam par rtog pa myed do/ /chos de dag la len pa myed do/ /chos de dag la 'dor ba myed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos yod pa ma yin pa de dag kyang yongs
su rdzogs par byed de/ chos de dag kyang yod pa 'ang ma yin myed pa 'ang ma yin no/ /ji ltar sprul pa de yod pa 'ang ma yin myed pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po yang sprul pa lta bu'i bzod pa la gnas shing / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed do/ /sems can gyi don kyang rab tu byed do/ /kye
rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sprul pa lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste/ dgu pa'o/ /bzod pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la mi gnas pa yin te/ ji ltar sprul pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la ni gnas par spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos
thams cad la rnam par rtog pa myed par spyod pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la dub pa myed par spyod pa dang / ji ltar
sprul pa de phyin ci log myed cing lus su dmyigs pa thams cad la lus myed par spyod pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de byin gyi rlabs kyis gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gzugs la myi
gnas par spyod pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de rang bzhin snang ba'i tshul du yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de chos thams cad la rnam

par grol ba'i chos gnas med par spyod pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de gnas myed pa'i rang bzhin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshul gyi rnam par byang ba la spyod pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi 'khor du cho 'phrul gyi nye bar 'gro ba myed par spyod pa dang / ji ltar sprul pa de khor yug dang / ri rab thams cad la snang ba bzhin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi nam mkha' lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar mtshan nyid myed
pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad la 'jug go/ /nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar zhing thams cad bsgrub pa myed pa'i tshul gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 'jug go/ /nam mkha'
ji lta ba de ltar gnyis su myed pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad la 'jug go/ /nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar 'jug pa myed pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa la 'jug go/ /nam
mkha' ji lta ba de ltar rnam par dbye ba myed pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas thams cad la 'jug go/ /nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar tha dad pa myed pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi stobs
thams cad la 'jug go/ /nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i tshul gyis bsam gtan thams cad la rab tu 'jug go/ /nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar
brjod du myed pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad yang dag par bstan pa la 'jug go/ /nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar chags pa myed cing sgrib pa myed pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi sku la 'jug go/ /nam mkha' ji lta ba de ltar nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshul gyi chos thams cad gsal ba myed pa la 'jug go/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam
mkha' lta bu'i chos thams cad la de lta bu'i bzod pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyi 'jug pa'i tshe/ lus nam mkha' lta bur rab tu 'thob po/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i lus kyi las rab tu 'thob bo/ /
nam mkha' lta bu'i ngag rab tu thob po/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i ngag gi las rab tu thob po/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i yid rab tu thob po/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i yid kyi las rab tu thob po/ /'di lta ste dper

na nam mkha' ni chos thams cad dang ldan te/ 'chi 'pho ba'ang myed do skye ba 'ang myed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad kyi lus dang ldan te shi 'pho ba'ang
myed do/ /skye ba yang myed do/ /'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni gzhi myed de tha dad pa myed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad shes pas gzhi myed
de sangs rgyas kyi stobs rnams dang tha myi dad do/ /'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi gzhi ste/ rang bzhin myed pa dang yul med pas gzhi yang ma yin no/ /de bzhin
du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad kyi gzhi yin te/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin myed pas gzhi yang ma yin no/ /'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni skye ba myed cing
'gag pa myed kyang 'jig rten thams cad kyi skye ba dang 'gag pa 'dzin to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jug pa 'ang myed yongs su rdzogs pa yang myed de/ 'jig
rten thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa yang rab tu ston to/ /'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni phyogs kyang ma yin/ phyogs mtshams kyang ma yin te/ phyogs rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la 'ang yang
dag par gzhol lo/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang las kyang ma yin/ rnam par smin pa yang ma yin te las dang rnam par smyin pa rgya mtsho yang yongs su
ston to/ /'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni ldang ba myed cing 'dug pa myed de/ rnam par phye ba mtha' yas pa 'ang yongs su ston to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
yang spyod pa yang med gnas pa yang myed de/ spyod pa rnam par phye ba 'ang yongs su ston to/ /'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni kha dog kyang ma yin/ kha dog myed pa 'ang ma yin te/ kha dog gis
rnam pa yang yongs su ston to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten gyi kha dog kyang ma yin/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i kha dog kyang ma yin
te/ kha dog mtha' yas pa yang yongs su ston to/ /'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni ring du gnas pa yang ma yin yud tsam du gnas pa yang ma yin te/ gnas pa dang yongs su gnas pa yang rab tu ston
to/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ring du gnas pa yang ma yin/ yud tsam du gnas pa yang ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa dang / yongs su gnas

pa yang rab tu ston to/ /'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni kun nas nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par gyur pa'ang myed la rnam par byang bas rnam par byang bar gyur pa yang myed do/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'jig rten la 'jug pas sgrib pa yang myed par dag cing bstsal bar gyur pa yang myed do/ /'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon sum du
gyur pa yin te/ 'jig rten thams cad ni nam mkha'i mngon sum du gyur pa ma yin no/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la mngon du gyur pa te/ byang chub
sems dpa' ni chos thams cad kyi mngon sum du gyur pa ma yin no/ /'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' ni gnas thams cad la rab tu gzhol ba yin te/ nam mkha'i mtha' ni yod pa ma yin
te/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos kyi gnas thams cad la gnas te/ byang chub kyi sems ni mtha' yod pa ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni bdag nyid
nam mkha' dang mnyam par byas te yongs su bsgoms pa dang / rnam par sbyangs pa dang / shin tu bsgrub pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du byas pa dang / rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu byas pa dang / ro gcig
tu byas pa dang / tshad gcig tu byas pa dang / nam mkha' lta bur dag pa'i kha dog tu byas pa dang / thams cad du 'gro bar byas pa'i phyir ro/ /chos thams cad la yang dag par sems pa

dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / chos thams cad tha myi dad pa rab tu thob par byed pa dang / zhing thams cad du 'gro bar bsgrub pa dang / lus thams cad la gnas pa myed pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
pa dang / phyogs thams cad la ma rmongs pa khong du chud par byed pa dang / stobs thams cad tha myi dad par bsgrub pa dang / yon tan thams cad yul mtha' yas par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /

chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas rab tu thob par byed pa dang / dpag tu med pa thob par byed pa dang / rdo rje ltar brtan pa la rab tu gzhog pa dang / dbyangs kyi yan lag tshad myed pa thams cad mngon par
bsgrub pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad du phyin cing chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi nam
mkha' lta bu'i bzod pa thob pa ste bcu pa'o/ /bzod pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'gro ba myed pa'i tshul du 'gro ba myed pa'i lus rab tu 'thob bo/ /'gag pa
myed pa'i tshul du skye ba myed pa'i lus rab tu thob po/ /'jigs pa myed pa'i tshul du 'pho ba myed pa'i lus rab tu thob po/ /ji ltar mthong ba ma yin pa'i tshul du bden pa myed pa'i lus rab tu
thob po/ /mtshan nyid myed pa'i tshul du mtshan nyid gcig pa'i lus rab tu thob po/ /sangs rgyas kyi stobs tshad myed pa'i tshul du tshad myed pa'i lus rab tu thob po/ /de bzhin nyid kyi

mtshan nyid kyi tshul du mnyam pa nyid kyi lus rab tu thob po/ /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid khong du chud cing bzod pa'i tshul du tha dad pa'i lus rab tu thob po/ /mnyam pa nyid kyi myig rnam par dag pas sgrib pa myed pa'i tshul du thams cad du

'gro ba'i lus rab tu thob po/ /chos thams cad ldan pa dang myi ldan pa myed pa'i tshul du 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i lus rab tu thob po/ /bsod nams zad myi shes pa'i tshul du nam mkha' ltar mtha' dang mu myed pa rab tu thob

po/ /chos thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyis mtshan nyid gcig pa'i tshul du chos nyid mnyam pa nyid thob pas zad mi shes shing thogs pa myed pa rab tu thob po/ /nam mkha' ltar thogs pa myed pa'i tshul du dbyangs

mtha' yas shing tshad myed pa rab tu thob po/ /nam mkha' ltar thams cad la thogs pa myed pa'i tshul du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs shing rnam pa rab tu thob po/ /nam mkha'

ltar rgyun chad pa myed pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtsho gcig nas gcig tu rgyud pa tshad myed pa thams cad rab tu thob po/ /nam mkha' ltar tshad myed cing mthar thug pa myed pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams

cad tshad myed pa'i zhing du byin gyis rlob pa rab tu thob po/ /nam mkha' rgya mtsho'i tshul du chos thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'
ltar 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa'i tshul du lus thams cad 'jig pa myed cing shin tu brtan pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi gdung ba thams cad kyi nam mkha' tshig par mi 'gyur
ba'i tshul du rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan la rno ba'i dbang po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis tshul
du 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'dzin pa'i stobs la yang dag par 'byung ngo / /kye rgyal ba'i sras dag 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bzod pa
thob pa bcu'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos don 'di nyid de bas kyang gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la tshigs su bcad
de smras pa/ ji ltar skyes bu la la zhig /rin chen 'byung gnas thos gyur nas/ /nor tshogs chen po bsags don du/ /rab tu dga' ba skye ba yin/ /de bzhin shes rab che ldan pa'i/ /byang
chub sems dpa' rgyal sras rnams/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mtshan/ /zab cing zhi ba rab tu nyan/ /zab pa'i chos ni thos gyur cing / /de dag yid ni 'jigs mi 'gyur/ /de dag
sems la lhod pa myed/ /skrag pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rgya chen dbyangs ni thos gyur nas/ /bzod pa'i dbyangs kyis byang chub tu/ /shes rab chen po yang dag 'jug /de la the rtsom skye ba med/ /
bdag ni thams cad mkhyen par byed/ /bdag ni mi'i mgon du bya/ /chos rab shin tu zab pa rnams/ /bdag gis sgra yi sgo nas thos/ /sgra yi rjes su 'brang bas ni/ /dga' ba'i dam pa mi
thob ces/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos don du/ /de yi mos pa brtan pa skye/ /bsam pa byang chub sems rab kyi/ /'dul zhing yongs su sgom pa byed/ /chos rnams 'khrug par mi byed de/ /
de yis dad pa rnam par 'phel/ /des ni sgra rjes 'gro ba yis/ /bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/ /spyod la shin tu brtson byed cing / /dbyangs kyi bzod la rab tu gnas/ /chos kyi 'byung gnas
yin pas na/ /shin tu brtson pa rab tu tshol/ /brtson 'grus ldog par mi byed de/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bsgrubs par byed/ /dbyangs tsam gyis ni gnas byed pas/ /byang chub sems la bag tsha

myed/ /dbyangs kyis mos pa rab tu thob/ /des ni rgyal ba mnyes par byed/ /skyes bu la la bsod nams rgyas gyur pas/ /gser 'byung gnas ni chen po rnyed gyur nas/ /rgyan pa'i gnas kyi rgyan du rab sbyangs
na/ /de dag lus dang 'thun pa'i rgyan du byed/ /de bzhin mkhas pas chos kyi phul thos na/ /sems dang blo yangs rgya mtshor bsgyur byas shing / /ji ltar sngon thos chos rnams rtogs par byed/ /mi mthun
tshul du chos la tshol mi byed/ /de dag rtogs nas shin tu 'thun par spyod/ /rnam par mi sgom chos ni gang yang myed/ /de dag chos rnams ji bzhin 'thun byed cing / /de bzhin chos rnams khong du chud
par byed/ /mkhas pa'i sems ni rnam dag skye gyur te/ /dga' ba'i sems yid rnam dag gsal ba skye/ /chos kyi yid la bdag nyid che ba brtson/ /rten cing 'brel 'byung chos la rab tu 'jug /
chos rnams mnyam pa nyid la de brtson te/ /dngos po rnam par bsgom la mngon par brtson/ /rgyal ba'i mdzod dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ /chos rnams mi mnyam med par rab tu shes/ /de ni
bsam pa mthar thug rab brtan pas/ /rgyal ba'i byang chub ji bzhin rab tu spyod/ /ri rab bzhin du myi g.yo brtan pa yis/ /de yi bsam pa byang chub mchog la brten/ /mnyam gzhag sems

dang ldan pas de brtson te/ /brtson 'grus ldan pa'i yid kyis rab tu spyod/ /bskal pa stong du spyad pa spyod byed kyang / /de ni brtson 'grus 'jig par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di dag chos la yang dag de 'jug ste/ /
rgyal ba'i rtogs bya'i gting yang rab tu rnyed/ /chos nyid zhi ba rab tu thob gyur pas/ /de la 'jug pa'i yid ni gang yang myed/ /dpe zla med pas ji skad gsungs pa ltar/ /de ni chos rnams mnyam pa
nyid du byed/ /myi mnyam tshul du bzod pa mi bskyed de/ /ye shes mnyam nyid yongs su rdzogs par bsgrub/ /bde bar gshegs pas 'thun par gang gsungs pa/ /de dag bzod pa'i sgo nas rab tu 'grub/ /chos
rnams 'jig dang ldan pa ma yin te/ /chos nyid ji bzhin de 'dra rab tu shes/ /lha gnas 'dir lha'i bu rnams 'dir 'dus dang / /sum bcu rtsa gsum gnas su lha rnams skye gyur pa/ /de dag zil
dngar sna tshogs rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan/ /de dag khar ba'i snod gcig sngon spyod zad gyur na/ /zil dngar zhim pa de dag 'ong ba ma yin te/ /phyogs bcu kun nas zil dngar stob pa myed/ /las rnams ji

lta ji bzhin lha rnams de ltar za/ /de la skye ba myed de bza' ba myed pa myin/ /de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i sems rab mngon skyes kyang / /de la rdul cha'i chos kyang skyes pa myed/ /ma skyes gang yin
chos de nam yang 'gag pa myed/ /dam pa'i chos kyi rkyen brten mkhas pa rab tu zhugs/ /ma 'gag gang yin mi zad chos rgyud de dang de/ /chos nyid 'di yi tshul la rab tu gnas pa yin/ /tha dad

myed pa'i chos dbyings 'di la rab tu 'jug /'jig rten tha dad myed pa'i rgyud kyi tshul yang shes/ /de bzhin nyid mnyam 'jig rten zhi ba'i gzhir gyur pa/ /gzhi med tha dad med pa'i yang dag mtha' shes te/ /
smon lam rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'gro la phan phyir 'debs/ /rgyal sras de ni bde gshegs mkhyen pa la'ang mngon chags myed/ /de ni dben gzhol sangs rgyas chos rnams ston pa byed/ /chos kyi shugs
las 'on kyang g.yo bar 'gyur ba myed/ /brda dang grangs kyi tshul gyis mngon par 'du byed de/ /'jig rten snying btser smon lam dam pa rab tu 'debs/ /smon lam 'debs la gnas kyang stobs
bcu ldan pa ste/ /'gro ba ma lus kun la de ni gnas pa myed/ /mkhas pa'i ye shes yongs su len dang 'dor ba spangs/ /chos dang chos kyi man ngag rnam pa'i tshul la mkhas/ /'di ni bzod
pa'i dam pa ma skyes chos can te/ /des ni chos rnams zad med zad par myi 'gyur ro/ /myi skye'i tshul gyis yongs su gdam bya'i chos kyi dbyings/ /de bzhin nyid las brtan pa rnam par 'gyur ba
myed/ /rgyal sras byang chub don du bzod pa 'dir gnas pa/ /de la phyogs kun sangs rgyas mtha' yas lung yang ston/ /rgyal sras de la sangs rgyas mkhyen pas dbang bskur mdzad/ /
phyogs bcu kun nas rab tu snang bar don du gnas/ /de dag chos kun rab tu zhi ba'i sems/ /mngon par bsgrub cing dge ba kun la 'gro ba 'god/ /dus gsum chos rnams kun gyis mtshan nyid
de 'dra bas/ /mtshan rnams yongs su dag byas sems can 'dul ba byed/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i chos rnams nges par su rtogs pa/ /de dag 'jig rten sna tshogs du ma rtogs byed cing / /'jig rten
sna tshogs sgyu tshul yang dag rtogs byas nas/ /las yangs shin tu bstsags pas rnam pa sna tshogs pa/ /sems las las kyi rnam pa du ma 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de bas 'jig rten sems
de sgyu ma lta bur bstan/ /de dag rnam rtogs sgyu ma 'dra bas nub par 'gyur/ /srid pa'i lam rgyud ma lus sgyu 'dra yang dag smin/ /ji ltar sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i byin rlabs byas pa'i gzugs/ /
lam gyis bzhi mdor 'jig rten phal gyi nang bstan pa/ /'gro bas mthong na de la kun kyang mos pa bskyed/ /sgyu mas 'jig rten las ni gang yang bsgrub mi 'gyur/ /de bzhin 'gro ba ji snyed gang

rnams yod pa dag /sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta bu ma skyes chos nyid de/ /dngos yod dngos myed de bzhin yod dang myed pa dang / /bskal pa mi mnyam tshul gyi 'gro rgyud rab tu ston/ /sgyu ma'i tshul rnams shes nas
sems can yongs su 'grel/ /sgyu ma lta bu yin par sems can khong du chud/ /sems can sgyu 'dra de bzhin sgyu ma sems can 'dra/ /sems can myed cing sgyu ma 'dra bar 'jig rten shes/ /sems can
zhing dang chos dang de bzhin dus gsum dang / /'jig rten thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam par rab tu 'byed/ /sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur chos rnams rab rtogs pas/ /'jig rten ma lus 'di dag sgyu ma'i rnam par

shes/ /skyes pa dag dang de bzhin bud myed rogs pa dang / /bu mo de bzhin rnam par dul ba nye bar ston/ /glang po rta dang ba glang phyugs dang shing rnams dang / /me tog 'bras bu bzang dang ldan pa'i mtsho yang ston/ /

thabs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs mang bar sgyu myi sems/ /sna tshogs gnas la'ang sgyu ma yongs su gnas pa myed/ /sgyu ma dben la gzhol zhing zhi ba dang / /'jig rten rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs mang po ston/ /

de bzhin rgyal sras btsun pa rigs dang ldan pa rnams/ /'jig rten sgyu ma sna tshogs ji bzhin ston pa byed/ /bsgom dang rnam par bsgom pa'i dngos po'i sems kyang myed/ /dngos po dngos myed sgyu ma ji bzhin
rab tu shes/ /zhing dang sems can chos kyi rnam pa mang por bcas/ /las rnams sna tshogs rnam pas yongs su bstsags pa la/ /gnas par mi byed mngon par chags pa de bzhin myed/ /chags

myed mtha' yis sgyu ma'i tshul ni nges shes so/ /de ltar rgyal sras mkhas pa rnams/ /rab tu dga' zhing spros pa myed pa ste/ /gnas myed sa dang yang dag ldan/ /chos dbyings de dag rab tu zhugs/ /de ni

chos nyid rtogs pa ste/ /brtan pa de dag rgyal ba'i sku skyes sras yin no/ /'du shes sgyu la mkhas pa ste/ /'gro ba thams cad 'du shes dra bar shes/ /smyig sgyu'i 'du shes 'du ba ste/ /'gro ba thams cad de
ltar 'du shes phyin ci log /'du shes rnams phye mkhas pa ste/ /de ni 'gro kun 'du shes spangs pa yin/ /sems can sna tshogs khong du chud/ /'jig rten kun gyi sna tshogs rnam pa kun dang bral/ /'jig
rten 'du shes rab tu shes/ /'jig rten 'du shes myed myin 'du shes ldan/ /phyogs rnams 'du shes 'dra ba ste/ /sems can mtha' yas 'du shes rnam pa sna tshogs yin/ /ma nor myig dang ldan pa rnams/ /
'jig rten sna tshogs 'du shes rab tu mthong / /'jig rten smyig rgyu 'dra ba ste/ /'du shes sna tshogs rnam pas 'jig rten rnam par bkod/ /'jig rten 'du shes gnas pa ste/ /de dag phyin ci log gsum
rnam par spangs/ /ji ltar smyig rgyu'i tshogs kyi rnams/ /'gro ba rnams la chu yi rnam par dmyigs par snang / /de la chu ni yod min yang / /chu yi 'du shes rnam par rab tu bslu/ /de bzhin 'jig
rten thams cad kyang / /khams gsum lam rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs mtha' yas te/ /'du shes rnam pa smyig sgyu bzhin/ /chags med yid ldan spyod yul mtha' yas so/ /'du shes thams cad
rnam par spangs/ /chags med ye shes ldan zhing spros pa myed pa rnams/ /'gro bar 'du shes chags gyur pa/ /'du shes bslu las brtan par byed/ /nga rgyal rlom dang dregs pa spangs/ /'du shes thams
cad bsal cing 'jig rten 'dren pa byed/ /myi zad zad pa rtog pa rnams/ /bden pa zad mi shes pa'i tshul 'di yin/ /'jig rten 'di dag thams cad rmi lam lta bur khong du chud/ /chos
rnams thams cad rmi lam ngo bo nyid du rab tu rtogs/ /rmi lam de dag yul la mi gnas phyogs la'ang mi gnas te/ /rmi lam lta bur 'jig rten rab tu zhi la de dag gzhol/ /rmi lam rang bzhin mkhas
shing rnam par rtog med chos dang ldan/ /rmi lam rtogs pa'i yid ldan sems la 'gyur ba gang yang myed/ /'jig rten kun tu rmi lam lta bur shin tu rgyu zhing spyod/ /dus gsum ma lus thams cad
sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul du rtogs/ /rmi lam shi 'phor 'gyur ba myed cing skye ba de bzhin myed/ /rmi lam phyogs rnams kun na yod pa ma yin myed pa myin/ /khams gsum rmi lam lta bur 'di
la rnam rtog myed byas shing / /rmi lam shin tu rtogs mkhas de dag sems la bcing pa myed/ /'gro ba rmi lam rang bzhin 'dra la de dag mi gnas te/ /'jig rten 'gro ba rnam par dben la
de dag brten pa med/ /'jig rten rnams la mi rtog de bzhin rnam par rtog pa myed/ /rmi lam rtogs shing mkhas pas bzod pa'i sa ni 'di yin no/ /rmi lam 'gro ba rnams na rnam
pa sna tshogs du ma snang / /tha dad rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan du bye brag rnam pa mang / /de bzhin ye shes zla bas 'gro ba thams cad rnam par mthong / /rmi lam sgra dang 'dra bar de dag rnam par
rtogs pa myed/ /rmi lam lta bu'i tshul gyis rnam pa brtan pas rab tu rtogs/ /de dag rmi lam mtshan nyid rnam 'das bskal pa mnyam pa myin/ /rmi lam de dag gcig pa ma yin nam
yang myed pa myin/ /rmi lam rnam bkod rnam par 'gro ba thams cad rab tu shes/ /de dag sems can thams cad rmi lam 'dra ba'i chos can dang / /zhing rnams thams cad rmi lam dang 'dra kun nas

myi rtog cing / /ji ltar nyon mongs de bzhin rnam par byang ba rab tu shes/ /'jig rten rmi 'dra de la rnam par rtog par byed pa gang yang myed/ /rmi lam lta bu'i spyod pas yang dag grub par gyur pa rnams/ /
rmi lam lta bu'i smon lam rnam pas gnas pa myed pa dag /rmi lam lta bu'i chos rnams kun la gnas cha mi byed do/ /'jig rten rmi lam 'dra la khyad par byed pa po yang myed/ /'jig rten 'di dag
rmi lam lta bu byung bar shes shing dag /rmi lam tshul rtogs 'gro ba kun tu myi 'jigs chos dang ldan/ /rmi lam bzhin spyod ldan pas 'jig rten kun tu chud mi za/ /ring thung kun kyang rmi lam
rgyud bzhin de dag rab tu shes/ /'di ni rmi lam lta bu'i yid ldan rnams kyi bzod pa ste/ /rmi lam lta bu'i 'jig rten sems can rab tu 'dren pa byed/ /sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rtog
byas chags myed ye shes can/ /sems la bcings myed 'gro ba khrag khrig yongs 'grel byed/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya che mtha' yas/ /chos rnams mngon par bsgrub
pa yongs su dag pa khong du chud/ /chos kyi chos nyid du ma'i tshul rnams khong du chud/ /chos tshul rnam pa tha dad kun la chags pa myed/ /'gro kun dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa ji snyed yod pa/ /

de dag sgra dbyangs sgra brnyan bzhin du des chud/ /sgrar brjod de dag nang na myed par rab tu shes te/ /sgra rnams thams cad phyi nang myed par rab tu shes/ /sgra brnyan ji ltar rnam pa sna tshogs sgra tshul
grag ste/ /rnam rtog dbyangs dang 'dra yang rnam rtog myed pa'i sgra yin/ /sgra rnams rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad de bzhin rab shes/ /sgra la mngon par chags myed de bzhin rlom pa'i
sems myed/ /sems can kun gyi gtso bo thams cad des mthong gyur cig /'jig rten mgon po chos rnams gsung zhing dbyangs sgrog mdzad pas/ /mdo gang brjod du myed pa rab tu gsung zhing ston kyang / /

rgyal ba'i gsung dbyangs de la de ni gnas par myi byed/ /sgra brnyan de dag ji ltar sgra yi rnam par grag kyang / /sgra brnyan rnam pa dag la sgra rnams gang yang yod myin/ /de ltar dbyangs kyi bye brag rjes
'brang chos kyi rnam pa/ /chos nyid 'jig myed ldan pa rnam phye chos la rab mkhas/ /de dag sgra dbyangs thams cad rnam par rab tu bsgoms ste/ /sgra rnams rnam par dbye la mkhas pas sgra rnams
sel byed/ /'gro ba kun dbyangs dbyangs tshul myin par rab tu shes te/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag dag pa de dag dbyangs kun rab shes/ /chos rnams de dag kun la sgra myed sgrar 'jug byed de/ /
brjod pa khrag khrig sna tshogs rnams kyi rjes su zhugs shing / /'gro ba thams cad sgra brnyan bzhin du mngon par ston byed/ /'gro ba ma lus kun gyi sgra yang de bzhin rab shes te/ /de dag
tshig tshul rjes su 'gro ba'i shes pa rtogs ldan/ /'jig rten 'di dag thams cad sgra brnyan yan lag 'drar shes/ /dbyangs kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag par khong du chud de/ /sgra yi mtshan
nyid ji bzhin 'jig rten de bzhin shes so/ /ji ltar sgra rnams chos rnams du ma rnam par ston byed/ /sgra yi rnam rtog sna tshogs dbyangs kyi yan lag kun ldan/ /'jig rten ma lus

kun dbyangs mtshan nyid ci 'dra de bzhin/ /'gro ba kun gyi mtshan nyid rgyal ba'i sras kyi rab shes/ /bzod pa 'di 'dra'i stobs kyi mkhas gyur dpa' bo de dag /sgra dbyangs sna tshogs 'jig rten kun tu yongs
su spyod de/ /dus gsum shes pa'i blo dang ldan pas sgra yi tshul shes/ /'on kyang rnam rtog gnas la de dag gnas myi 'cha'o/ /zhi ba'i yid ldan 'di ltar byang chub brtson/ /'jig rten phan pa'i
don du byang chub tshal/ /chos nyid rab tu zhi la rtag tu 'jug /bstan pa 'jig rten rnams la rtog myi byed/ /mi sgul mthu can ye shes stobs ldan pas/ /chos nyid dngos myed zhi ba ji bzhin du/ /
'jig rten thams cad ma lus des shes te/ /de la gzhol zhing phan par de spyod do/ /'gro ba kun la nam yang mi gnas te/ /'gro ba kun dang 'bral bar byed ma yin/ /'gro ba kun la de ni gnas
mi 'cha'/ /de la gnas pa gang yang yod pa myin/ /'gro ba chos nyid rang bzhin ldan par shes/ /dad bzhin de la 'ang gnas par myi byed de/ /'gro ba 'di la 'ang de ni rten mi byed/ /'gro ba'i
gnas las yongs su 'grol ba yin/ /'jig rten gnas pa ji snyed gang yang rung / /de dag rang bzhin tshul rnams kun shes te/ /gnyis med chos kyang bstan pas rab tu shes/ /gnyis
myed de la'ang de ni gnas mi 'cha 'a/ /de ni 'jig rten rnams dang ldan gyur kyang / /'jig rten lam la gnas pa'i sems myed de/ /'jig rten phyi rol spyad pa spyod pa myin/ /chos kun
ye shes rang bzhin yin par shes/ /chu la gzugs brnyan ji ltar snang ba rnams/ /nang na mi 'dug phyi na mi gnas pa/ /de bzhin brtan pa byang chub don du spyod/ /'jig rten rnam sgom 'jig
rten yod pa myin/ /'jig rten skye myed grol ba ma yin te/ /'jig rten brjod par mi nus gyur pa myin/ /'jig rten phyi rol rgyu ba'ang ma yin te/ /'gro ba 'di ni gzugs brnyan ji
bzhin no/ /de ltar zab pa'i tshul las byung bas na/ /dag cing 'od gsal dri myed sems dang ldan/ /ye shes gzhol bas chos kyi sgron ma ste/ /smon lam kun las yongs kyang ldog pa myed/ /
de ni 'jig rten stsogs par mi byed de/ /ye shes mthar thug mtha' yang mi dmyigs so/ /skye dgu mtha' yas kun la bde byed de/ /'gro ba kun las chags pa rnam par bzlog /dpe myed
rnams kyi zab pa nyid la ltos/ /'gro ba kun gyi don du rab tu brtson/ /bzod pa 'di ni ye shes gzhol ba ste/ /de ltar gnas shing spyad pa de 'dra spyod/ /chos gnas rnam par dben la rab tu
zhugs/ /sprul pa de 'dra kun dang ldan gyur cing / /sprul pa'i dngos la spyod pa rjes song bas/ /sprul pa'i dngos po nam yang gtong ba myed/ /de ni byang chub spyod pas sa mchog tu/ /sprul
pa'i dngos ldan rjes su spyad pas na/ /sprul pa de 'dra'i tshul la rnam par gnas/ /de bas 'gro kun sprul par rab tu shes/ /skye dgu'i las kyi rnam pa mtha' yas pa/ /sprul pa'i dngos
dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam/ /sprul pa'i mtha' rtogs shin tu rnam par dben/ /myi yi mgon po thams cad sprul par shes/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas ji snyed gang bzhugs pa/ /
smon lam gang btab spyod pa spyad pa'i rgyu/ /des ni myi gtso thams cad sprul pa yin/ /gang gis sems can rnam dag sprul pa yin/ /byams dang snying rje chen po shin tu yangs/ /de ltar
sprul pa rnams phye shes pa na/ /de dag byin gyis rlabs 'phrul snang bar byed pa'o/ /de dag 'jig rten rnam par rtog pa myed/ /sprul pa'i dngos tshul 'gro ba thams cad shes/ /'gro ba'i las gyi
rnam pa gang yod pa'i/ /'jig rten de dag sprul pa'i sas bsgrubs pa'i/ /sprul pa'i mdzod mang rnam par phye ba la/ /zhugs shing byang chub spyod pa spyad byas pas/ /de dag sna tshogs bye brag
rnam pa mang / /'jig rten las kyi rnam pas byas pa bzhin/ /sprul pa rnam par rtog pa myed pa ste/ /sprul pa nam yang yongs su rtog pa myed/ /rtog dang rnam par rtog pas yid dben pa/ /sprul
pa bzhin du de dag spyod pa yin/ /sprul pa rgya mtsho shes pas khong du chud/ /sprul pa'i dngos pos 'jig rten rgyas kyang 'debs/ /sprul pa myi gnas 'gro ba myed pa ste/ /sprul pa ji bzhin de bzhin
ye shes so/ /de ni nam mkha' gnas myed ji bzhin du/ /bzod pa bcu yi tshul la rab tu 'jug /de ni mkha' 'drar chos rnams kun byas shing / /sems can sems can myed par nam
mkha' shes/ /de ni nam mkha' lta bu'i shes ldan te/ /de la chags pa gang yang yod pa myin/ /ji ltar nam mkha' sna tshogs ma yin pa/ /de ltar 'jig rten chags myed rab tu shes/ /
de ni bzod pa mkha' 'dra mthu ldan pas/ /mi zad nam mkha' bzhin du zad pa myed/ /de ni mkha' 'dra'i spyod yul thob gyur kyang / /mkha' la rnam par rtog pa mi byed do/ /nam mkha'
la ni ngo bo nyid myed de/ /nam mkha'i sa mtshams nam yang chad pa myed/ /mkha' la bye brag tha dad yod pa myin/ /de ni mkha' 'dra'i blo yi stobs dang ldan/ /mkha' la mthar thug
rtsa ba myed pa ste/ /nam mkha' la ni mtha' dbus yod pa myin/ /mkha' la rnam pa tha dad de bzhin myed/ /ye shes stobs kyang nam mkha' de dang 'dra/ /brtan pas de 'dra'i chos nyid rab shes te/ /

ji ltar nam mkha' skyes pa myed pa dang / /ji ltar nam mkha' 'gag pa myed tshul du/ /de 'dra'i chos nyid dam pa nges thob po/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba'i chos la de gnas shing / /phyogs rnams kun gyi 'gro ba kun

ston to/ /bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad bcom byas shing / /mkha' 'dra'i bzod pa'i tshul la shin tu brtan/ /des ni mkha' 'drar mtshan nyid myed pa kun/ /'jig rten ji snyed mtshan nyid tha dad pa/ /mtshan

nyid mtshan 'das mtshan ma myed tshul du/ /kun kyang yang dag mkha' dang 'dra bar byed/ /gang la dus gsum thams cad gnas pa yin/ /chos nyid mkha' 'dra des ni shes byas shing / /de ni rnam par phye ba gcig
tshul gyis/ /'gro ba thams cad nam mkha'i tshul du shes/ /de ni nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes lus/ /de ni nam mkha' lta bu'i sgra dbyangs ldan/ /de ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin lus can te/ /ye shes

nam mkha' lta bu zhi bas gnas/ /rgyal ba'i sras kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ /bzod pa bcu po 'di dag de dag gi/ /bzod pa'i stobs la de dag rab gnas pa/ /'jig rten phan pa'i don du bshad cing bstan/ /
de'i tshul la bstan pa bslabs pa rnams/ /ye shes 'di la shin tu mthu che ste/ /chos kyi mthu dang ye shes mthur yang ldan/ /byang chub tshul rjes bsam pa'i sems dang ldan/ /bzod pa
'di yi tshul la zhugs pa ni/ /ye shes stobs kyi chags pa myed la 'jug /'jig rten lhar bcas de dag zil gyis non/ /'jig rten dag tu 'khor lo bla med bskor/ /de dag spyod tshul

shin tu rgya che bas/ /de dag tshad ni 'jig rten kun myed de/ /skyes bu 'dul ba dpe zla myed pa yin/ /ye shes rgya mtsho'i tshul la de dag zhugs/ /bdag myed sems kyi 'jig rten spyod pa'i tshe/ /chos kyi
rnam dag gyur pa'i yid ldan pas/ /bstan pa de dag 'di 'dra'i chos la 'jug /chos nyid des kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed/ /'gro ba'i tshad ni thams cad shes par nus/ /sems can ma lus
thams cad bgrangs bar nus/ /rdul gcig rtse la ma lus zhing bgrang nus/ /mkhas pa'i yon tan de dag mtha' yas so/ /sangs rgyas sras po skyes bu chen po la/ /bzod pa bcu po 'di dag yod pa na/ /
ye shes spyod yul sgor kyang 'gro kun gyi/ /tshad du bgrang bar nus pa yod pa myin/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ bzod pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ sum
bcu lnga pa'o// // sangs rgyas rmad ga cad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po nyi shu dgu pa/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal pos 'di skad
ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das grangs ma mchis pa shin tu bstan pa zhes bgyi ba dang / grangs ma mchis pa'i grangs ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba de/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na grangs ma mchis pa bstan

pa lags/ tshad ma mchis pa dang / mu ma mchis pa dang / kun tu mtha' yas pa dang / bgrang du mi rung ba dang / mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / gzhal du ma mchis pa dang / brjod
du ma mchis pa'i yang brjod du ma mchis pa lags na/ ji ltar bstan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal po la 'di skad ces bka'
bstsal to/ /kye skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/ /skyes bu dam pa de ltar khyod kyis 'jig rten thams cad grangs kyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mkhyen pa'i

don 'di de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la zhu bar bsam pa legs so legs so lagaso de bas na skye bu dam pa legs par nyon la rab tu yid la zung shig dang bstan par bya'o/ /bcom ldan
'das de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la phyir nyan to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /skyes bu dam pa de la

'di skad ces bya ste/ brgya stong phrag brgya na bye ba'o/ /bye ba bye ba na khod khod do/ /khod khod khod khod na tha gu'o/ /tha gu tha gu na khrag khrig go/ /khrag khrig khrag khrig na thams thams so/ /thams thams

thams thams na myad myid do/ /myad myid myad myid na gang ya'o/ /gang ya gang ya na ban bun no/ /ban bun ban bun na phyar phyur ro/ /phyar phyur phyar phyur na lcag lcig go/ /lcag lcig lcag lcig na byang

bying ngo / /byang bying byang bying na chem chem mo/ /chem chem chem chem na phyal phyol lo/ /phyal phyol phyal phyol na khyud khyud do/ /khyud khyud khyud khyud na zer zer ro/ /zer zer zer zer na khrib khrib po/ /

khrib khrib khrib khrib na ya gangs so/ /ya gangs ya gangs na cho ma'o/ /cho ma cho ma na khram khrim mo/ /khram khrim khram khrim na nab nub po/ /nab nub nab nub na sang sang ngo / /sang sang sang sang na brgyud
yas so/ /brgyud yas brgyud yas na btang yas so/ /btang yas btang yas na bkra yar ro/ /bkra yar bkra yar na gsa' yas so/ /gsa' yas gsa' yas na mtshungs myed do/ /mtshungs
myed tshungs myed na lam lum mo/ /lam lum lam lum na yal yol lo/ /yal yol yal yol na khral khrul lo/ /khral khrul khral khrul na thud thud do/ /thud thud thud thud na bsam phyod do/ /bsam phyod

bsam phyod na brang breng ngo / /brang breng brang breng na bgrod yas so/ /bgrod yas bgrod yas na bsngo yas so/ /bsngo yas bsngo yas na zang yag go/ /zang yag zang yag na 'phyo bkye'o/ /'phyo bkye 'phyo bkye
na brtse 'phyo'o/ /brtse 'phyo brtse 'phyo na yong tan no/ /yong tan yong tan na 'brug g.yos so/ /'brug g.yos 'brug g.yos na sang yal lo/ /sang yal sang yal na thing yug go/ /thing yug
thing yug na yid 'phyo'o/ /yid 'phyo yid 'phyo na nab neb po/ /nab neb nab neb na khrib thabs so/ /khrib thabs khrig thabs na yal yal lo/ /yal yal yal yal na bgrang yas so/ /bgrang yas
bgrang yas na thug yal lo/ /thug yal thug yal na shang shang ngo / /shang shang shang shang na yag yag go/ /yag yag yag yag na tham thim mo/ /tham thim tham thim na rlom brlal lo/ /rlom
brlal rlom brlal na gzhal 'phyos so/ /gzhal 'phyos gzhal 'phyos na gzhal yal lo/ /gzhal yal gzhal yal na gzhal myed do/ /gzhal myed gzhal myed na gzhal 'khor to/ /gzhal
'khor gzhal 'khor na gzhal thim mo/ /gzhal thim gzhal thim na gar gzhal lo/ /gar gzhal gar gzhal na gzhal sangs so/ /gzhal sangs gzhal sangs na gzhal thag go/ /gzhal
thag gzhal thag na gzhal phul lo/ /gzhal phul gzhal phul na gzhal zhi'o/ /gzhal zhi gzhal zhi na 'phyo 'gyur ro/ /'phyo 'gyur 'phyo 'gyur na nyar nyer ro/ /nyar nyer nyar nyer na phyag phyig
go/ phyag phyig phyag phyig na zal zul lo/ /zal zul zal zul na sal sal lo/ /sal sal sal sal na g.yo ldeg go/ g.yo ldeg g.yo ldeg na phan phun no/ /phan phun phan phun na brnang

ya'o/ /brnang ya brnang ya na rem 'drol lo/ /rem 'drol rem 'drol na rdzi ngad to/ /rdzi ngad rdzi ngad na rdzi rdul lo/ /rdzi rdul rdzi rdul na phun yol lo/ /phun yol phun yol na ngad ngad do/ /ngad ngad ngad ngad na bgrang

brtsi'o/ /bgrang brtsi bgrang brtsi na zab bgrang ngo / /zab bgrang zab bgrang na dga' rkyang ngo / /dga' rkyang dga' rkyang na gzhung 'dal lo/ /gzhung 'dal gzhung 'dal na khrug phyod do/ /khrug phyad khrug phyad na 'od
phyod do/ /'od phyod 'od phyod na 'dab yas so/ /'dab yas 'dab yas na gcal yas so/ /gcal yas gcal yas na bgrang yas so/ /bgrang yas bgrang yas na byim 'phyo'o/ /byim 'phyo byim
'phyo na yam mye'o/ /yam me yam me na brnyal yas so/ /brnyal yas brnyal yas na ldab ldeb po/ /ldab ldeb ldab ldeb na phan chad do/ /phan chad phan chad na phang phung ngo / /phang phung phang phung
na khe'u tshang ngo / /khe'u tshang khe'u tshang na zhung zung ngo / /zhung zung zhung zung na mchog yal lo/ /mchog yal mchog yal na mtha' rdul to/ /mtha' rdul mtha' rdul na yun 'gyangs so/ /yun
'gyangs yun 'gyangs na bun lob bo/ /bun lob bun lob na lam lom mo/ /lam lom lam lom na bsnyad yas so/ /bsnyad yas bsnyad yas na lang ling ngo / /lang ling lang ling na ljab ljib
po/ /ljab ljib ljang ljib na myi brtsal to/ /mi brtsal mi brtsal na 'byam yas so/ /'byam yas 'byam yas na nga 'grong ngo / /nga 'grong nga 'grong na smos yal lo/ /smos yal smos yal
na bkra chal lo/ /bkra chal bkra chal na lo rgyas so/ /lo rgyas lo rgyas na 'bum rdib po/ /'bum rdib 'bum rdib na gam gum mo/ /gam gum gam gum na la lo'o/ /la lo la lo na bgrang 'phyos
so/ /bgrang 'phyos bgrang 'phyos na bgrang 'phyos la bsgres so/ /bgrang 'phyos la bsgres bgrang 'phyos la bsgres pa na dpag yas so/ /dpag yas dpag yas na dpag yas la bsgres pa'o/ /
dpag yas la bsgres pa dpag yas la bsgres pa na yul phyong ngo / /yul phyong yul phyong na yul phyong la bsgres pa'o/ /yul phyong la bsgres pa yul phyong la bsgres pa na mu yal to/ /mu yal
mu yal na mu yal la bsgres pa'o/ /mu yal la bsgres pa mu yal la bsgres pa na bgrang yol lo/ /bgrang yol bgrang yol na bgrang yol la bsgres pa'o/ /bgrang yol la bsgres pa bgrang yol
la bsgres pa na myi 'jal to/ /myi 'jal myi 'jal na myi 'jal la bsgres pa'o/ /myi 'jal la bsgres pa myi 'jal la bsgres pa na bsam phyod do/ /bsam phyod bsam phyod na bsam phyod la bsgres
pa'o/ /bsam phyod la bsgres pa bsam phyod la bsgres pa na mtha' 'byam mo/ /mtha' 'byam mtha' 'byam na dpag thag go/ /dpag thag dpag thag na dpag thag la bsgres pa'o/ /dpag
thag la bsgres pa dpag thag la bsgres pa na brjod du myed pa'o/ /brjod du myed pa brjod du med pa na brjod du myed pa la bsgres pa'o/ /brjod du myed pa la bsgres pa na brjod du myed pa'i yang
brjod du myed pa la bsgres pa shin tu bstan pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi rgyal po la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ brjod du myed pa'i brjod du

myed pa ni/ /brjod du myed pa thams cad 'tshang bar 'gyur/ /brjod du myed pa bskal bar brjod byas kyang / /brjod du myed la mthar thug gang yang myed/ /brjod du myed pa'i sangs rgyas zhing gi rnams/ /
thams cad bshig ste rdul tu kun blags shing / /gcig rtse la'ang gcig po brjod myed par/ /thams cad brjod du myed par rab tu 'jug /zhing rnams brjod du myed pa'i brjod myed pa/ /skad gcig sems
kyis kun kyang rab tu 'jig /skad gcig re rer 'jig pa brjod du myed/ /'jig pas bskal ba mang po zad par byed/ /dbye ba'i bye brag dbye ba brjod du myed/ /rdul la 'jug pa brjod du myed pa ste/ /bgrang
ba'i tshul gyis brjod du myed pa yi/ /bskal pa brjod du myed pa zad par byed/ /rdul dang rdul la mtshan nyid brjod du myed/ /brjod du myed pa'i rdul rnams kun bzung ste/ /bskal pa kun tu bzang por
bstod byas kyang / /kun tu bzang po de bsngags mthar mi 'jug /brjod du myed pa'i kun tu bzang po rnams/ /skra rtse re re kun la yang dag 'jug /skra rtse gcig bzhin yul rnams kun la ste/ /
chos dbyings ma lus ji snyed de bzhin no/ /skra rtse re rer zhing gi khams kyi rnams/ /brjod du myed par yang dag 'dzud par byed/ /mkha' dbyings skra yi rtse mos gzhal du rung / /zhing rnams thams

cad brjod du myed pa'o/ /skra yi rtse mo de la sangs rgyas zhing gi rnams/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par phye ba mang / /bskal ba mi mthun zhing rnams brjod du myed/ /bskal ba mthun pa'i zhing yang brjod du
myed/ /skra rtse gcig po de la brjod med pa'i/ /zhing rnams dag pa brjod du myed pa dang / /sna tshogs rgyan rnams brjod du med pa 'god/ /rnam pa du ma tha dad brjod du myed/ /ming gi tshogs kyang
brjod du med pa ste/ /skra rtse gcig la thams cad rab tu gzhol/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan rnams re re yang / /brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa yin/ /sangs rgyas re re brjod du myed pa yi/ /sku

rnams ba spu'i khung bur byin gyis rlob/ /spu gcig nas kyang brjod du myed pa yi/ /kha dog sna tshogs mang po rab tu 'byung / /spu gcig nas kyang brjod du myed pa yi/ /'od gzer brjod du med pa rab tu 'gyed/ /

'od zer re re las kyang brjod myed pa'i/ /pad mo brjod du med pa mang po 'byung / /pad mo re re la yang brjod med pa'i/ /lo ma brjod du myed pa mang po 'byung / /brjod du med pa'i brjod du myed pa yi/ /

lo ma kha dog dpag tu med pa ste/ /kha dog re re de bzhin brjod du med/ /pad mo re re lo ma brjod du med/ /lo ma re re'i 'od gzer brjod du myed/ /kha dog tha dad rnam pa brjod du myed/ /kha dog re re brjod med
de dag las/ /'od zer mang po brjod du med pa 'byung / /'od zer kun las brjod med zla ba 'byung / /zla ba las kyang zla ba brjod du med/ /zla ba re re las kyang brjod med pa'i/ /kha dog
mtha' yas ldan pa'i 'od mang 'byung / /kha dog re re las kyang brjod med pa'i/ /nyi ma kun tu snang ba brjod du myed/ /nyi ma re re las kyang brjod med pa'i/ /kha dog brjod du myed pa sna tshogs
'byung / /kha dog re re las kyang brjod med pa'i/ /'od zer brjod du myed pa rab tu 'byung / /'od zer re re la'ang brjod med pa'i/ /seng ge'i khri mang brjod med sna tshogs gnas/ /seng ge'i
khri mang sna tshogs re re las/ /'od gzer brjod du med pa'i brjod med 'byung / /kha dog sna tshogs brjod du myed pa dang / /dag pa sna tshogs brjod du myed pa 'byung / /'od gsal re re las
kyang brjod myed pa'i/ /rnam par snang ba sna tshogs rab tu 'byung / /rnam par snang ba sna tshogs re re las/ /brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa yi/ /brjod du med la bsgres pa'i grangs snyed
kyis/ /ri rab pad mo'i mchog dang ldan pa 'byung / /ri rab re re'i tshad kyang 'di tsam ste/ /brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa yi/ /zhing rnams brjod du myed pa yangs pa rnams/ /ri rab gcig gi
yongasu rgyas pa ste/ /brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa yi/ /ri rab lhag ma rnams kyang de tsam mo/ /de dag bshig ste rdul phran char blags na/ /yon tan legs pa brjod med de snyed ldan/ /de
bzhin bye brag khyad par bzung byas ste/ /brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa ste/ /brjod du med la bsgres pa yongs bzung zhing / /'od zer brjod du med pa rab tu 'byung / /tshigs bcad brjod
du myed pa gsal ba'i rnams/ /rnam par dbye ba brjod du med pa 'byung / /brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten khams su rgyu/ /de bzhin sangs rgyas brjod du med pa 'byung / /brjod du myed pa'i brjod du
med pa yi/ /skad cig re rer bden pa brjod du med/ /phyi ma'i mtha' yi mu mthar bstan byas kyang / /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mu med do/ /sangs rgyas re re zhing yang brjod med pa/ /brjod du
med la bsgres pa gsal dag pa'i/ /dbyangs kyi yan lag brjod med gsal rig par/ /'khor lo brjod du med pa rab tu bskor/ /'khor lo re re bskor bas brjod myed pa'i/ /mdo sde brjod du
med pa mang po 'byung / /mdo sde brjod du med pa re re las/ /chos kyi rnams grangs brjod med gsal bar 'byung / /chos rnams brjod du med pa re re las/ /shin tu bstan chos brjod du
med par 'byung / /shin tu bstan pa brjod med re re yang / /sems can brjod du med pa rnam par 'dul/ /de dag skra rtse gcig la 'jug pa ste/ /skra gcig ji bzhin ma lus kun la yang / /
brjod du med pa'i brjod du med pa ste/ /bskal pa brjod du med pa zad par byed/ /chags med sems kyang brjod du med pa ste/ /de dag sangs rgyas brjod med sprul pa byed/ /sangs rgyas re re brjod

du med pa las/ /bsgres pa'i tshul du sprul pa kun tu 'byung / /phyogs rnams brjod du med pa kun tu 'dod/ /de dag sku yang brjod du med pa ste/ /rnam par phye sku de bzhin brjod du med/ /kha dog sna tshogs rnam
pa grangs med do/ /sangs rgyas zhing tshad brjod du med par yang / /sems can brjod med rnam par ston par byed/ /rnam par bstan pa de dag re re zhing / /sems can brjod du med pa yongs su sbyong / /de

dag rgyan bzang rnam phye brjod du med/ /de dag rdzu 'phrul mang po'ang brjod du med/ /rnam dag dbang yang brjod du med pa ste/ /cho 'phrul rnams kyang brjod du med par 'byung / /rnam par 'phrul pa brjod
du med pa ste/ /spyod yul rnams kyang de bzhin brjod du med/ /de dag byin gyis brlabs kyang brjod med de/ /'jig rten brjod du med pa'i khams su 'byung / /chos tshul rnam dag brjod du myed
pa ste/ /tshul gyis mdo 'di brjod du myed pa 'byung / /mdo sde re re las kyang brjod med pa'i/ /brjod du med chos yang dag rab tu 'byung / /chos rnams re re las kyang brjod myed pa'i/ /shin
